name: Illogically Speaking
short_description:
I am using this blog to share with you the illogical things that cross my path. Everyday, there is something that I just look at and think, why is that happening right now? 

Whether it's the things people do, respectable, wicked or just down right out there. Sometimes it's the raw nature that surrounds me, the breathtaking beauty or the harsh reality that can teach us all lessons about life.

I think a lot of people will enjoy reading the crazy shit that seem to cross my path daily. Enjoy Illogically Speaking.
summary: There's always something I see everyday that is not explainable.
